game.name: Roach Post
game.shortDescription: Restore an abandoned post office by order of the Royal Postal Academy! Welcome customers, send parcels, hire cute little roach-workers and pass Inspectors’ checks in an incredibly addictive roguelite puzzle Roach Post!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Restore an abandoned post office by order of the Royal Postal Academy! Welcome customers, send parcels, hire cute little roach-workers and pass Inspectors’ checks in an incredibly addictive roguelite puzzle Roach Post!
